name: Prime Dream @
description:
First game created on Unity, based on a Unity Learn tutorial, but with assets and extras all of my own. VERY buggy.

I'm only posting here because the WebGL version don't really work, so I can't keep it on Unity Play. So, here is the instller.

From my Unity Play description:
"Based upon the Ruby 2D tutorial, I tried to get out of the box, pushing on an adventure direction. Searched Unity Learn and the web for things I wanted to do and tried to implement - other scenes, music, start, game over, ending, and even a secret area!. Ended up creating this ghostly dream world. I'm a graphic design/llustrator, so I could create quick makeshift assets to give it a unique feel. It's full of bugs and I couldn't implement things that didn' work with a copy and paste of the codes... And Raycast is not really my friend, the interactions don't work as they suppose... But for a first try, I'm very proud!"
